The phenoreportr Tutorial: Development Documentation

Andrey Smelter

2021-12-28

Source: vignettes/development.Rmd
development.Rmd

Installation

First clone the repo from github:

$ git clone git@github.com:Ancestry/NatGenCOVIDpaper2022.git
$ cd clean_pheno_package/phenoreportr

Next, install the package from R console using devtools R package:

> install.packages("devtools")
> library(devtools)
> devtools::install()

Documentation

Documenting R functions

We use roxygen2 R package to document available R functions. In order to create documentation files for available functions first use roxygen2 documentation style. Invoke devtools::document() command for your package, this will build documentation files under man directory as well as refresh NAMESPACE file.

> devtools::document()
Updating phenoreportr documentation
Loading phenoreportr
Writing NAMESPACE

Building package documentation

We use pkgdown R package to build documentation for entire package. This allow us to build static html documentation under docs directory using available *.Rd, *.Rmd, and README.md files under man and vignettes directories.

First, set option to disable external CRAN lookup:

> options(pkgdown.internet = FALSE)

Next, invoke pkgdown::build_site() command to build package documentation:

> pkgdown::build_site()
Installing package into temporary library
Building pkgdown site
Reading from: '/phenoreportr'
Writing to:   '/phenoreportr/docs'
Initialising site
Building home
Building function reference
Reading 'man/extract_questions.Rd'
Reading 'man/load_data.Rd'
Reading 'man/load_ethnicity.Rd'
Reading 'man/load_pheno.Rd'
Reading 'man/load_survey.Rd'
Reading 'man/phenoreportr.Rd'
Reading 'man/phenotype_sample_size_by_response_plot.Rd'
Reading 'man/prevalence_plot.Rd'
Reading 'man/prevalence_table.Rd'
Reading 'man/response_combined_table.Rd'
Reading 'man/response_sample_size_by_question_table.Rd'
Building articles
Reading 'vignettes/development.Rmd'
Writing 'articles/development.html'
Reading 'vignettes/tutorial.Rmd'
Building news
DONE

Updating package documentation

Documentation is uploaded to github pages. To update it commit changes in docs directory to master branch of phenoreportr package.

Contents

Developed by Genevieve Roberts, Andrey Smelter.
